definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="46" y="46"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="setsize"><field name="scale">HITBOX_HEIGHT</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value><next><block type="setsize"><field name="scale">HITBOX_WIDTH</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1.5</field></block></value><next><block type="setsize"><field name="scale">BASE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><next><block type="setsize"><field name="scale">MOTION</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">SLOWNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">72000</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
